column4: hey everyone. I just downloaded an update from update manager this morning for adobe flash 64 plugin, and now I am having problems with flash player.
yeah im having the same problem
are you in 64bit ubuntu?
yes
ah :D
i got it to work but not from update-manager
yea me too. I had to downgrade to the last stable version
have you tried the incubator build?
im using the beta i think
I don't think so. my version # is 10.3.183.5
im using 11.+
and the 64bit works? I just tried installed the upgrade to 10.4.1 and it stopped playing certain things
its odd that it is in 32 bit lib directory
maybe thats why the flash-aid isnt working
I got flash working but its just at a lower version
flashaid fixed it. I just had to downgrade from the update I installed this morning
no I have 10.3.183.5. I will try uninstall this version and installing 11 and than use the flashaid
yea I uninstalled version 10 and then installed version 11 and ran flashaid but does not play
how did you install version 11? did you change permission?
I installed it through package manager
you want an ubuntu pure flashplayer?
its fine actually. I am able to play everything good with no problems with 10.3
ok
thanks for the help though. I got it working again so its all good :D
